summary: Completed comprehensive testing of loan calculator and approval link features. All backend APIs working correctly, frontend loan calculator functional with interactive sliders, admin dashboard approval workflow operational, and AcceptLoan page successfully processing banking information submissions.
passed_tests: Backend loan calculator API (/api/calculator) - returns correct calculations
Backend approval token generation when status=approved
Backend form validation for banking information
Frontend loan calculator with interactive sliders for amount and term
Frontend calculator displays monthly payment, total payment, total interest
Frontend calculator updates calculations when sliders change
Admin dashboard displays applications with correct statuses
Admin dashboard shows Banking badges for completed submissions
AcceptLoan page loads correctly with valid approval token
AcceptLoan page displays loan amount and borrower name
AcceptLoan page terms agreement checkbox functionality
AcceptLoan page banking form fields (account, routing, card info)
AcceptLoan page form validation and submission
AcceptLoan page success message after banking info submission
End-to-end workflow: application creation → approval → token generation → banking submission → admin dashboard update
